text: Adolf Bohlin (born 9 March 1873) was a Swedish missionary. He served with the Mission Union of Sweden in Chinese Turkestan (present day Xinjiang). ==Bibliography== *J. Lundahl (editor), På obanade stigar: Tjugofem år i Ost- Turkestan. Stockholm, Svenska Missionsförbundet Förlag, 1917 ==External links== *Mission and Change in Eastern Turkestan (English Translation of select chapters of Mission och revolution i Centralasien) Category:Swedish Protestant missionaries Category:Protestant missionaries in China Category:Christian missionaries in Central Asia Category:1873 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Swedish expatriates in China
title: Adolf Bohlin
